headline: Labcorp Expands Collaboration with PathAI to Deploy FDA-Cleared Digital Pathology Platform Nationwide
summary: Labcorp (NYSE: LH), a global leader of innovative and comprehensive laboratory services, today announced an expanded collaboration with PathAI to deploy AISight® Dx1, an FDA-cleared digital pathology platform, across its national network of anatomic pathology labs and hospital collaborations. The cloud-based technology allows pathologists to view and manage slides digitally and use AI to support key steps in the diagnostic process.

content.title: Labcorp Expands Collaboration with PathAI to Deploy FDA-Cleared Digital Pathology Platform Nationwide
